title: [BUG REPORT] Kindred bug.
body:
Wolf marks monsters in the friendly jungle it seems.


HOWEVER: there is no need to disable kindred for another 4 weeks to fix it! 
we will live with it.

btw kindred is an awesome champ.

replies.body: Heya thanks for the report! I'm passing this on to the team.  It's not that the wolf is marking monsters in the friendly jungle, but that the mark color corresponds to Kindred's team. Basically, red marker = red side Kindred, blue marker = blue side Kindred.  It will look the same for the Kindred on each team.

Ahhh ok thanks  for that :)
So will it be changed to red = enemy and blue = ally?

Also thanks so much riot for creating these really interesting champs like Azir Tahm kindred etc ^^
They make the game feel so much more alive :)

I'm so excited to play Kindred!  We don't have them in NA yet :(

As far as what will be changed (if anything), I can't really speak to that as that's a decision the Kindred team will make.
Hey if its not too much trouble, could you update us on the Kindred team's decision to either change it or keep it the same once they make it?
Hrm, I don't know what their call was, but any change wouldn't happen until patch 5.21 at the earliest.  I'll try to remember to pop back and update if I hear about any changes :3

Ok cool :)
Only if you remember and it's not too much trouble hahha Thanks I apprecaite it :)
Hello! I remembered. So, as you have probably already seen in the patch notes, we changed it so the allied Kindred's indicator is always blue. Cheers!
Logically they should have had it set to change depending on the players settings for team colours in the first place, so as to avoid this kind of confusion. I mean, Riot is all about clarity, right?

Oh that's right it was just recently changed to oce being first aye, well it shouldn't be long then, they are an amazing champ! You're gunna have lots of fun ^^

Ah ok I see, thanks for that, well we will see what happens then haha personally I find it confusing for enemies to have red as a minimap colour but blue for kindred camps and vice versa, but they will know best :)
Does this happen with Skarner too?
that was when the marking did it as "you're red team, so your kindred is going to be a red mark, they blue so theirs is a blue mark"
If they disable Kindred before I can play her, I will make you regret it bronzer.
